mapper.select:
SELECT
(SELECT CODE_ID FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_ID = inv.STK_TYPE_ID) typeid,
(SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_ID = inv.STK_TYPE_ID) typenm, (SELECT name FROM SYS0038M WHERE STUS_CODE_ID = INV.STUS_CODE_ID) statusname, (SELECT STUS_CODE_ID FROM SYS0038M WHERE STUS_CODE_ID = INV.STUS_CODE_ID) statusid, inv.IS_SIRIM issirim, inv.IS_NCV isncv, nvl(inv.SERIAL_CHK,'N') serialchk, inv.STK_CODE stockcode,
(SELECT CODE_ID FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_ID=inv.UOM)
(SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_ID=inv.UOM)
uomname, inv.STK_DESC stockname, (SELECT
MAX(CODE_ID)
MAX(CODE_NAME)
FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_ID = inv.STK_CTGRY_ID) categotynm, INV.NET_WT netweight, INV.GROS_WT grossweight, inv.MEASURE_CBM mcbm, inv.STK_TYPE_ID typeid, inv.STK_OLD_CODE oldstkcd, inv.IS_STOCK_AUDIT isstockauditm, inv.stk_size, inv.is_smo, inv.is_serial_replc FROM SYS0026M inv WHERE inv.STK_ID = #{stockId}

select
nvl(op.PRC_COSTING , 0) pricecost, nvl(op.amt , 0) amt , nvl(op.PRC_PV , 0) pricepv , nvl(sp.amt , 0) mrental , nvl(sp.PRC_RPF , 0) pricerpf , 0 as penalty , nvl(op.TRADE_IN_PV , 0) tradeinpv
nvl(op.PRC_COSTING , 0) pricecost, nvl(op.amt , 0) amt , 0 as pricepv , 0 as mrental , 0 as pricerpf , nvl(op.PRC_CHRG , 0) penalty , 0 as tradeinpv
from
SYS0026M inv , (select * from SAL0016M where APP_TYPE_ID = 66 and MEM_PAC_ID = #{srvpacid}) sp , (select * from SAL0016M where APP_TYPE_ID = 67 and MEM_PAC_ID = #{srvpacid}) op
SAL0016M op
where 1 = 1
and inv.STK_ID = sp.STK_ID(+) and inv.STK_ID = op.STK_ID(+) and inv.STK_ID = #{stockId}
and op.STK_ID = #{stockId} and op.APP_TYPE_ID = #{appTypeId} and op.MEM_PAC_ID = #{srvpacid} and op.STUS_CODE_ID = 1

SELECT op.ROW_NO, op.PRC_ID, op.MEM_PAC_ID, op.STK_ID, op.UOM_ID, op.UOM_CONV, op.APP_TYPE_ID, NVL(op.PRIOD, 0) , op.STUS_CODE_ID, op.CRT_USER_ID, to_char(op.CRT_DT,'YYYY/MM/DD') CRT_DT,
NVL(op.PRC_COSTING , 0) pricecost, NVL(op.amt , 0) amt , NVL(op.PRC_PV , 0) pricepv , NVL(op.amt , 0) mrental , NVL(op.PRC_RPF , 0) pricerpf , 0 as penalty , NVL(op.TRADE_IN_PV , 0) tradeinpv
NVL(op.PRC_COSTING , 0) pricecost, NVL(op.amt , 0) amt , 0 as pricepv , 0 as mrental , 0 as pricerpf , NVL(op.PRC_CHRG , 0) penalty , 0 as tradeinpv
FROM SYS0026M inv LEFT JOIN LOG0058D op ON inv.STK_ID = op.STK_ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND op.APP_TYPE_ID IN (66,67,1412) AND inv.STK_ID = #{stockId} AND op.MEM_PAC_ID = #{srvpacid}
AND op.STK_ID = #{stockId} AND op.APP_TYPE_ID = #{appTypeId} AND op.MEM_PAC_ID = #{srvpacid} AND op.STUS_CODE_ID = 1
ORDER BY ROW_NO DESC

SELECT SY26M.STK_ID STOCKID, LG44D.BOM_COMPNT ||' - '|| SY26M.STK_DESC STOCKNAME, SY26M.STK_TYPE_ID TYPEID, SY13M.CODE_NAME TYPENM, LG44D.VALID_FROM_DT, LG44D.VALID_TO_DT, LG44D.COMPNT_QTY QTY, LG44D.LEAD_TM_OFFSET PERIOD FROM LOG0043M LG43M, LOG0044D LG44D ,SYS0026M SY26M, SYS0013M SY13M WHERE 1=1 AND LG43M.BOM = LG44D.BOM AND LG44D.BOM_COMPNT = SY26M.STK_CODE AND SY26M.STK_TYPE_ID=SY13M .CODE_ID AND NVL(LG44D.DEL_INDICT, 'N') <> 'Y'
AND SY26M.STK_TYPE_ID=63
AND SY26M.STK_TYPE_ID=62
AND LG43M.MATRL_NO =#{stockId} ORDER BY SY26M.STK_ID

SELECT SP.STK_ID STKID , SP.MEM_PAC_ID PACKAGEID , PM.SRV_MEM_CODE || ' - ' ||DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR (PM.SRV_MEM_DESC, 4000) PACKAGENAME , NVL(SP.AMT , 0) CHARGEAMT FROM SAL0016M SP , SAL0091M PM WHERE 1 = 1
AND SP.STK_ID = #{stockId} AND SP.APP_TYPE_ID = 67 AND SP.MEM_PAC_ID <> 0 AND SP.MEM_PAC_ID = PM.SRV_MEM_PAC_ID ORDER BY PACKAGENAME

SELECT CD.CODE_NAME codenm , ISI.IMG_ANGLE_ID angeid , ISI.CRT_DT cdate , ISI.CRT_USER_ID cuser , ISI.IMG_URL imgurl , ISI.STUS_CODE_ID scodeid , ISI.STK_ID stkid , ISI.STK_IMG_ID imgid , ISI.UPD_DT udate , ISI.UPD_USER_ID uuser FROM SYS0027M ISI , SYS0013M CD WHERE 1 = 1
AND ISI.IMG_ANGLE_ID = CD.CODE_ID AND ISI.STUS_CODE_ID = 1 AND ISI.STK_ID = #{stockId} ORDER BY imgid
mapper.update: MERGE INTO SAL0016M A USING ( SELECT * FROM SYS0026M WHERE STK_ID = #{stockId} ) SRC ON ( A.STK_ID = SRC.STK_ID AND A.MEM_PAC_ID = #{srvPackageId} and A.APP_TYPE_ID = #{appTypeId} ) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(PRC_ID,MEM_PAC_ID,STK_ID,UOM_ID,UOM_CONV,START_DT,END_DT,CNTY_ID, APP_TYPE_ID,CRT_USER_ID,CRT_DT,STUS_CODE_ID) VALUES( (SELECT MAX(PRC_ID)+1 FROM SAL0016M), #{srvPackageId}, SRC.STK_ID, SRC.UOM, 1, sysdate, to_date('209912312359','yyyymmddhh24miss'), 0, #{appTypeId}, 349 , sysdate, 1 )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SAL0016M ( PRC_ID ,MEM_PAC_ID ,STK_ID ,AMT ,UOM_ID ,UOM_CONV ,START_DT ,END_DT ,CNTY_ID ,APP_TYPE_ID ,PRIOD ,PRC_RPF ,PRC_PV ,TRADE_IN_PV ,CRT_USER_ID ,CRT_DT ,UPD_USER_ID ,UPD_DT ,PRC_CHRG ,PRC_COSTING ,STUS_CODE_ID ) VALUES ( #{pac_id} ,#{srvpacid} ,#{stockId} , TO_NUMBER (replace(#{amt},',', '')) ,71 ,1 ,sysdate ,sysdate ,1 ,NVL(#{appTypeId},69) ,0 ,NVL(#{pricerpf},0) ,NVL(#{pricepv},0) ,NVL(#{tradeinpv},0) ,#{crtUserId} ,sysdate ,#{crtUserId} ,sysdate ,NVL(#{pricecharges}, 0) ,NVL(#{pricecosting}, 0) ,1 )
mapper.select: SELECT SRV_MEM_PAC_ID pacid ,SRV_MEM_CODE memcd , SRV_MEM_CODE || ' - ' || SRV_MEM_DESC cdname FROM SAL0091M WHERE SRV_MEM_STUS_ID = 1 ORDER BY SRV_MEM_CODE
SELECT NVL(MAX(PRC_ID),0)+1 FROM SAL0016M
SELECT NVL(MAX(BOM_ID),0)+1 FROM LOG0001M
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOG0058D (ROW_NO, PRC_ID, MEM_PAC_ID, STK_ID, AMT, UOM_ID, UOM_CONV, APP_TYPE_ID, PRIOD, PRC_RPF, PRC_PV, TRADE_IN_PV, PRC_CHRG, PRC_COSTING, STUS_CODE_ID, CRT_USER_ID, CRT_DT) SELECT LOG0058D_ROW_NO.NEXTVAL, PRC_ID, MEM_PAC_ID, STK_ID, AMT, UOM_ID, UOM_CONV, APP_TYPE_ID, PRIOD, PRC_RPF, PRC_PV, TRADE_IN_PV, PRC_CHRG, PRC_COSTING, STUS_CODE_ID, #{upd_user}, SYSDATE FROM SAL0016M WHERE PRC_ID = (SELECT PRC_ID FROM SAL0016M WHERE STK_ID = #{stockId} AND APP_TYPE_ID = #{appTypeId} AND MEM_PAC_ID = #{srvpacid})
mapper.select: SELECT LIMIT1.STK_ID STK_ID ,LIMIT1.STK_CODE STK_CODE ,LIMIT1.STK_DESC STK_DESC ,LIMIT1.STK_CTGRY_ID STK_CTGRY_ID ,LIMIT1.CODE_NAME CODE_NAME ,LIMIT1.STK_TYPE_ID STK_TYPE_ID ,LIMIT1.CODENAME1 CODENAME1 ,LIMIT1.STUS_CODE_ID STUS_CODE_ID ,LIMIT1.NAME NAME ,LIMIT1.IS_SIRIM IS_SIRIM ,LIMIT1.IS_NCV IS_NCV ,LIMIT1.QTY_PER_CARTON QTY_PER_CARTON ,LIMIT1.UPD_USER_ID UPD_USER_ID ,LIMIT1.C1 C1 ,LIMIT1.UPD_DT UPD_DT ,LIMIT1.NET_WT NET_WT ,LIMIT1.GROS_WT GROS_WT ,LIMIT1.MEASURE_CBM MEASURE_CBM ,LIMIT1.STK_GRAD STK_GRAD ,LIMIT1.BS_POINT BS_POINT ,LIMIT1.UNIT_VALU UNIT_VALU ,LIMIT1.C2 C2 ,LIMIT1.C3 C3 ,LIMIT1.C4 C4 ,LIMIT1.C5 C5 ,LIMIT1.C6 C6 ,LIMIT1.C7 C7 ,LIMIT1.C8 C8 ,LIMIT1.C9 C9 ,LIMIT1.C10 C10 ,LIMIT1.C11 C11 FROM (SELECT EXTENT1.STK_ID STK_ID ,EXTENT1.STK_CODE STK_CODE ,EXTENT1.STK_DESC STK_DESC ,EXTENT1.STK_CTGRY_ID STK_CTGRY_ID ,EXTENT1.STK_TYPE_ID STK_TYPE_ID ,EXTENT1.STUS_CODE_ID STUS_CODE_ID ,EXTENT1.IS_SIRIM IS_SIRIM ,EXTENT1.IS_NCV IS_NCV ,EXTENT1.QTY_PER_CARTON QTY_PER_CARTON ,EXTENT1.UPD_USER_ID UPD_USER_ID ,EXTENT1.UPD_DT UPD_DT ,EXTENT1.NET_WT NET_WT ,EXTENT1.GROS_WT GROS_WT ,EXTENT1.MEASURE_CBM MEASURE_CBM ,EXTENT1.STK_GRAD STK_GRAD ,EXTENT1.BS_POINT BS_POINT ,EXTENT1.UNIT_VALU UNIT_VALU ,EXTENT2.CODE_NAME CODE_NAME ,EXTENT3.CODE_NAME CODENAME1 ,EXTENT4.NAME NAME ,CASE WHEN (EXTENT5.USER_ID IS NOT NULL) THEN EXTENT5.USER_NAME ELSE '' END C1 ,(SELECT CODE_ID FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_ID=EXTENT1.UOM) C2 ,(SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_ID=EXTENT1.UOM) C3 ,CASE WHEN (61 = EXTENT1.STK_TYPE_ID) THEN CASE WHEN (EXTENT6.AMT IS NOT NULL) THEN EXTENT6.AMT ELSE UTILS.CONVERT_TO_FLOAT (0, 53) END WHEN (EXTENT7.AMT IS NOT NULL) THEN EXTENT7.AMT ELSE UTILS.CONVERT_TO_FLOAT (0, 53) END C4 ,CASE WHEN (EXTENT1.MASTER_STK_ID IS NOT NULL) THEN EXTENT1.MASTER_STK_ID ELSE 0 END C5 ,CASE WHEN (EXTENT1.STK_COMM_AS IS NOT NULL) THEN EXTENT1.STK_COMM_AS ELSE UTILS.CONVERT_TO_FLOAT (0, 53) END C6 ,CASE WHEN (EXTENT1.STK_COMM_OS_AS IS NOT NULL) THEN EXTENT1.STK_COMM_OS_AS ELSE UTILS.CONVERT_TO_FLOAT (0, 53) END C7 ,CASE WHEN (EXTENT1.STK_COMM_BS IS NOT NULL) THEN EXTENT1.STK_COMM_BS ELSE UTILS.CONVERT_TO_FLOAT (0, 53) END C8 ,CASE WHEN (EXTENT1.STK_COMM_OS_BS IS NOT NULL) THEN EXTENT1.STK_COMM_OS_BS ELSE UTILS.CONVERT_TO_FLOAT (0, 53) END C9 ,CASE WHEN (EXTENT1.STK_COMM_INS IS NOT NULL) THEN EXTENT1.STK_COMM_INS ELSE UTILS.CONVERT_TO_FLOAT (0, 53) END C10 ,CASE WHEN (EXTENT1.STK_COMM_OS_INS IS NOT NULL) THEN EXTENT1.STK_COMM_OS_INS ELSE UTILS.CONVERT_TO_FLOAT (0, 53) END C11 FROM SYS0026M EXTENT1 LEFT JOIN SYS0013M EXTENT2 ON EXTENT2.CODE_ID = EXTENT1.STK_CTGRY_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M EXTENT3 ON EXTENT3.CODE_ID = EXTENT1.STK_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M EXTENT4 ON EXTENT4.STUS_CODE_ID = EXTENT1.STUS_CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M EXTENT5 ON EXTENT5.USER_ID = EXTENT1.UPD_USER_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0016M EXTENT6 ON (67 = EXTENT6.APP_TYPE_ID) AND (61 = EXTENT1.STK_TYPE_ID) AND (EXTENT6.STK_ID = EXTENT1.STK_ID) AND (0 = EXTENT6.MEM_PAC_ID) AND (1 = EXTENT6.STUS_CODE_ID) LEFT JOIN SAL0016M EXTENT7 ON (61 <> EXTENT1.STK_TYPE_ID) AND (EXTENT7.STK_ID = EXTENT1.STK_ID) AND (0 = EXTENT7.MEM_PAC_ID) AND (1 = EXTENT7.STUS_CODE_ID) LEFT JOIN SYS0013M EXTENT8 ON (61 = EXTENT1.STK_TYPE_ID) AND (EXTENT8.CODE_ID = EXTENT6.UOM_ID) LEFT JOIN SYS0013M EXTENT9 ON (61 <> EXTENT1.STK_TYPE_ID) AND (EXTENT9.CODE_ID = EXTENT7.UOM_ID) WHERE EXTENT1.STK_ID = #{stockId} AND ROWNUM <= 1) LIMIT1
mapper.update: UPDATE SYS0026M SET UPD_DT = SYSDATE, UPD_USER_ID= #{loginId}, STK_COMM_OS_AS =#{outrate_as}, STK_COMM_AS =#{rate_as}, STK_COMM_OS_BS = #{outrate_bs}, STK_COMM_BS = #{rate_bs}, STK_COMM_OS_INS =#{outrate_install}, STK_COMM_INS =#{rate_install} WHERE STK_ID = #{stockId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SAL0016M (PRC_ID, MEM_PAC_ID , STK_ID, AMT, UOM_ID, UOM_CONV, START_DT, END_DT, CNTY_ID , APP_TYPE_ID, CRT_USER_ID, CRT_DT) VALUES((SELECT MAX(PRC_ID)+1 FROM SAL0016M), 0, #{stkid} , #{insnp} , #{insUom} , 1 , sysdate , to_date('209912312359','yyyymmddhh24miss'),0,67 , #{loginId} , sysdate )
mapper.select: select max(stk_id) +1 from sys0026m
select count(1) cnt from sys0026m where stk_code = #{insStockCode}

SELECT CODE_ID , CODE ,
CASE WHEN CODE_MASTER_ID = 367 THEN (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_ID = 66 and DISAB = 0 AND CODE_MASTER_ID = 10) ||' - '|| CODE_NAME WHEN CODE_MASTER_ID = 368 THEN (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_ID = 67 and DISAB = 0 AND CODE_MASTER_ID = 10) ||' - '|| CODE_NAME WHEN CODE_MASTER_ID = 370 THEN (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_ID = 1412 and DISAB = 0 AND CODE_MASTER_ID = 10) ||' - '|| CODE_NAME ELSE NULL END AS CODE_NAME, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR (CODE_DESC, 4000) DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN CODE_MASTER_ID = 367 THEN 66 WHEN CODE_MASTER_ID = 368 THEN 67 WHEN CODE_MASTER_ID = 370 THEN 1412 ELSE NULL END AS APPTYPEID FROM SYS0013M WHERE DISAB = 0 AND CODE_MASTER_ID IN (367,368,370)
SELECT TO_CHAR(inv.EOS_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS EOS, TO_CHAR(inv.EOM_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS EOM FROM SYS0026M inv WHERE inv.STK_ID = #{stockId}
mapper.update: UPDATE SYS0026M SET EOS_DATE = TO_DATE(#{eosDate}, 'DD/MM/YYYY') NULL , EOM_DATE = TO_DATE(#{eomDate}, 'DD/MM/YYYY') NULL , UPD_USER_ID = #{upd_user} , UPD_DT = SYSDATE WHERE STK_ID = #{stockId}
mapper.select: SELECT CODE CODE_ID , CODE , CASE WHEN CODE_MASTER_ID = 367 THEN (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_ID = 66 and DISAB = 0 AND CODE_MASTER_ID = 10) ||' - '|| CODE_NAME WHEN CODE_MASTER_ID = 368 THEN (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_ID = 67 and DISAB = 0 AND CODE_MASTER_ID = 10) ||' - '|| CODE_NAME WHEN CODE_MASTER_ID = 370 THEN (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_ID = 1412 and DISAB = 0 AND CODE_MASTER_ID = 10) ||' - '|| CODE_NAME ELSE NULL END AS CODE_NAME, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR (CODE_DESC, 4000) DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN CODE_MASTER_ID = 367 THEN 66 WHEN CODE_MASTER_ID = 368 THEN 67 WHEN CODE_MASTER_ID = 370 THEN 1412 ELSE NULL END AS APPTYPEID FROM SYS0013M WHERE DISAB = 0 AND CODE_MASTER_ID IN (367,368,370)

SELECT
NVL(PRC_COSTING, 0) PRICECOST, 0 AMT, NVL(PRC_PV, 0) PRICEPV, NVL(AMT, 0) MRENTAL, NVL(PRC_RPF, 0) PRICERPF, 0 PENALTY, NVL(TRADE_IN_PV, 0) TRADEINPV
NVL(PRC_COSTING, 0) PRICECOST, NVL(AMT, 0) AMT, NVL(PRC_PV, 0) PRICEPV, 0 MRENTAL, 0 PRICERPF, 0 PENALTY, NVL(TRADE_IN_PV, 0) TRADEINPV
NVL(PRC_COSTING, 0) PRICECOST, NVL(AMT, 0) AMT, NVL(PRC_PV, 0) PRICEPV, 0 MRENTAL, 0 PRICERPF, 0 PENALTY, NVL(TRADE_IN_PV, 0) TRADEINPV
NVL(PRC_COSTING, 0) PRICECOST, NVL(AMT, 0) AMT, NVL(PRC_PV, 0) PRICEPV, 0 MRENTAL, NVL(PRC_RPF, 0) PRICERPF, NVL(PRC_CHRG, 0) PENALTY, NVL(TRADE_IN_PV, 0) TRADEINPV
FROM SAL0016M WHERE STK_ID = #{stockId} AND MEM_PAC_ID = #{srvpacid} AND APP_TYPE_ID = #{appTypeId} ORDER BY UPD_DT DESC

SELECT ROW_NO, PRC_ID, MEM_PAC_ID, STK_ID, UOM_ID, UOM_CONV, APP_TYPE_ID, NVL(PRIOD, 0) PRIOD, STUS_CODE_ID, CRT_USER_ID, TO_CHAR(CRT_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD') CRT_DT,
NVL(PRC_COSTING, 0) PRICECOST, NVL(AMT, 0) AMT, NVL(PRC_PV, 0) PRICEPV, NVL(AMT, 0) MRENTAL, NVL(PRC_RPF, 0) PRICERPF, 0 PENALTY, NVL(TRADE_IN_PV, 0) TRADEINPV
NVL(PRC_COSTING, 0) PRICECOST, NVL(AMT, 0) AMT, 0 PRICEPV, 0 MRENTAL, 0 PRICERPF, NVL(PRC_CHRG, 0) PENALTY, 0 TRADEINPV
FROM LOG0058D WHERE 1=1 AND APP_TYPE_ID = #{appTypeId} AND STK_ID = #{stockId} AND MEM_PAC_ID = #{srvpacid}
AND STUS_CODE_ID = 1
ORDER BY ROW_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SAL0357M ( PRC_REQST_ID ,MEM_PAC_ID ,STK_ID ,APP_TYPE_ID ,AMT ,PRC_CHRG ,PRC_COSTING ,PRC_RPF ,PRC_PV ,TRADE_IN_PV ,APPV_STUS ,APPV_USER_ID ,APPV_DT ,REMARK ,CRT_USER_ID ,CRT_DT ,UPD_USER_ID ,UPD_DT ,CHG_REMARK ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(PRC_REQST_ID) + 1, 1) FROM SAL0357M) ,#{srvpacid} ,#{stockId} ,#{appTypeId} ,TO_NUMBER (replace(#{amt},',', '')) ,NVL(#{pricecharges}, 0) ,NVL(#{pricecosting}, 0) ,NVL(#{pricerpf},0) ,NVL(#{pricepv},0) ,NVL(#{tradeinpv},0) ,60 ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,#{crtUserId} ,sysdate ,#{crtUserId} ,sysdate ,#{chgRemark} )
mapper.select: SELECT STK_CODE FROM SYS0026M WHERE STK_ID = #{stkId}
